channel.title: Need Help Getting My Server Up And Running
channel.description:
EDIT
I download the official PhoneScape source and I will adopt it as my own for KaineScape.
Just 1 problem. I went through and edited compile.bat and runserver.bat and ran them and the runserver is still saying Phonescape. Plus, I have the DUC v2.2.1 (from the no-ip site) running with my host server
kainescape.servebeer.com <-- I put that in under New Server 43594 <-- I put that in under New Port
I punched in a username and password I wanted and hit the connect button and it gave me the old error message, server may be down, yada yada. I clicked the little smiley face on DUC V.2.2.1 so it's smiling instead of wearing glasses and tried it, still the error message.
[size=14pt]The only thing I did not do in the guide was the router IP thing as I do not see any "gaming" button and I cannot find my routers IP.[/size]
What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Need Help Getting My Server Up And Running
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

Whats “port forward?”

I got my router IP and punched it in on internet but it came up as login failed. I got windows xp and I’m under the Owner status. Maybe I have to switch to Administrator?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 01:47:31 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind, I am an administrator…it is my laptop.

What do I do now? It keeps saying user login failed whenever I try to login to my router…is there a backdoor access method like a program file or something?

I have a Belkin F5D7230-4

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Getting My Server Up And Running

did u port forward

item.title: Need Help Getting My Server Up And Running
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

There you go, there’s the guide.

I’ve done everything in it, except for things involving source files.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 01:00:32 PM[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post but I’ve download the Phonescape source. I’ve edited the topic starting post (read above) and I still need help. Thanks for reading.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 01:16:26 PM[/size][hr]Cmon people. I gotta work Wednesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday so I wont have much time to do anything with my private server.

Thats why I need your help now.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Getting My Server Up And Running

item.title: Need Help Getting My Server Up And Running
item.dc:creator: @noobxstyle noobxstyle
item.description:
@noobxstyle wrote:

I’d like to do the same thing as you.

Could you either give me a link to this step by step guide as i have not found it, or just reply with it pasted in?

I appreciate it!

Thanks

Read full topic
